snippet: A group of four, protected under President Obama’s executive actions, filed a petition to keep a federal judge from obtaining the personal information of immigrants in 26 states.
abstract: Four young immigrants directly petition federal appeals court to prevent Judge Andrew S Hanen from securing list of names and addresses of those were given three-year deportation deferrals and work permits under executive actions by Pres Obama; Hanen is hearing challenge filed by 26 states to president's programs.
lead_paragraph: A group of four, protected under President Obama’s executive actions, filed a petition to keep a federal judge from obtaining the personal information of immigrants in 26 states.

headline.main: Immigrants Want List of Names and Addresses Kept From a Texas Judge
headline.print_headline: Immigrants Seek to Keep List of Names From a Judge
